phrs.translation: [植物]早熟禾；[植物]肯塔基蓝草

sentences.translation: 肯塔基州：兰草音乐，蓝色心情？

sentences.sentence: And they have something in common - they both love bluegrass music!
sentences.translation: 他们有一个共同的爱好。

sentences.sentence: A research project called Bluegrass built a software collaboration tool as an Eclipse plug-in.
sentences.translation: 一个称为Bluegrass的研究项目以eclipse插件的形式构建了一个软件协作工具。
